# flipr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of flipr is to flip the rows and columns of a data frame. Included is an example dataset.

## Installation

You can install the released version of flipr from [Github](https://github.com) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("fieldima/flipr", ref = "0.1.0")
```

```
## Example

This is a basic example of when you would use flipr:

```{r example}
library(flipr)

#Packaged with flipr is a set of simulation data that needs to be flipped.
sim <- simulation_data

#Can either return as a data frame or a tibble
flip(sim)
flip(sim, TRUE)

```
